EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
Your Monthly Survey on the Remittance of Foreign Balance for the month {!CASE(Currency_Center_Survey__c.Month_Survey__c,'1','January','2','February','3','March','4','April','5','May','6','June','7','July','8','August','9','September','10','October','11','November','12','December','')} is now open. Please ensure you provide us with complete information by latest 14th {!CASE(MONTH(TODAY()),1,'January',2,'February',3,'March',4,'April',5,'May',6,'June',7,'July',8,'August',9,'September',10,'October',11,'November',12,'December','')}. Your participation is essential to IATA Currency Repatriation advocacy efforts.
Should you have any queries, please log a case in your IATA Customer portal under the topic "Currency Center".
Kind regards, Currency Center Team
